RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:On Error Resume Next&echo:Set wmi = GetObject(^"winmgmts:\\.\root\cimv2^"^))"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:Set colDrv = wmi.ExecQuery(^"SELECT * FROM Win32_PnPEntity WHERE DeviceID LIKE '^%VEN_1AF4^&DEV_1042^%' OR DeviceID LIKE '^%VEN_1AF4^&DEV_1001^%'^"^)&echo:For Each objDriver in colDrv)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:Set drive = wmi.Get(^"Win32_DiskDrive.DeviceID='\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0'^"^)&echo:If Err.Number ^<^> 0 Then&echo:Msgbox Err.Description&echo:WScript.Quit 1&echo:End If)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo:If drive.InterfaceType = ^"IDE^" Or drive.InterfaceType = ^"SCSI^" Then&echo:WScript.Quit 0&echo:Else&echo:MsgBox ^"Assertion failed.^"&echo:WScript.Quit 1&echo:End If)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SELECT DISK=0&echo:CLEAN&echo:CONVERT GPT&echo:CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=300&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL=^"System^"&echo:ASSIGN LETTER=S&echo:CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY)"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"
